data.title: State makes it cheaper to replace your lawn to save water and save money
data.excerpt: One of the most effective ways to cut back on water use is to replace your lawn with drought-resistant plants and landscaping. Now Californians can get more money to do just that thanks to a new law signed by Governor Gavin Newsom. The legislation exempts local rebates for turf replacement from state income tax.
data.author: Kalin Kipling
